entry.title: Open Design Engine - Feature #32: Add embedded video support to wiki
entry.content:
• Status changed from New to In Progress
  • % Done changed from 0 to 30

Youtube plugin in svn and installed on server. (Little Lines)

entry.title: Open Design Engine - Feature #32: Add embedded video support to wiki
entry.content:
• % Done changed from 30 to 50

Vimeo support added by Littlelines. This just leaves the question of supporting locally uploaded videos.

entry.title: Open Design Engine - Feature #32: Add embedded video support to wiki
entry.content:
• Status changed from In Progress to Feedback

I suggest the requirement for locally hosted video be reconsidered, or at least moved to another issue and marked as low priority / on-hold
